attributes.action: Leave the EU isn't legally binding,few ways it could theoretically be overturned
attributes.additional_details: Uncertainty about Britain’s future relationship with the EU, its largest trading partner, could push the UK into a recession.Brexit could trigger a breakup of the UK.So Britain's exit from the EU could strengthen the hand of Scottish separatists.
attributes.background: We request all MP to vote again in Parliament.Britain's vote to leave the EU is not legally binding, and there are a few ways it could theoretically be blocked or overturned.
